data.title: Splunkâ€™s Paul Kurtz on leveraging AI to enhance solutions
data.meta_description: Splunk speaks with CyberScoop at CyberTalks 2023.
data.text: Paul Kurtz, chief cybersecurity advisor & field CTO for Splunk, emphasizes the importance of a partnership approach in integrating AI into organizations, focusing on solving specific problems for customers. Paul also highlights the necessity of automation in cybersecurity due to the growing dependence on extended supply chains and the need to be thoughtful about its application. He emphasizes understanding customer needs and maintaining a constant dialogue for effective cybersecurity. Additionally, Paul underscores the importance of thinking about resilience and observing whether issues arise from a threat actor or other factors.
